a.name: A. Get to the Ship
a.imagePath: vassal_extracted/images/mission-cards/Mos Eisley Outskirts-A-Get to the Ship.png

a.name: Local Trouble
a.setup:
Thugs are hostile to all figures except other thugs.
A figure can attack a thug (Health: 4, Defense: 1 black die)
a.endOfRound:
Move each thug 2 spaces to the closest hostile figure. Then, each hostile figure adjacent to a thug suffers 2 Damage. (If multiple hostile figures are tied for closest to the thug, then the player with Initiative decides which figure is targeted.)
The player who controls the Cantina gains 6 VPs.
